name: eggd_fusioninspector
title: eggd_fusioninspector
summary: App which runs FusionInspector from its official Docker image. It identifies fusions using known 'rescue list' fusion pairs, plus predictions from STAR-Fusion

inputSpec.name: fi_docker
inputSpec.label: fi_docker
inputSpec.help: File ID of FusionInspector Docker image in DNAnexus

inputSpec.name: r1_fastqs
inputSpec.label: Read 1 fastq files
inputSpec.help: R1 FASTQ file(s) for a single sample

inputSpec.name: r2_fastqs
inputSpec.label: Read 2 fastq files
inputSpec.help: R2 FASTQ file(s) for a single sample

inputSpec.name: known_fusions
inputSpec.label: known_fusions
inputSpec.help: A .txt file of known fusions which should be searched for. First column must be in format 'geneA--geneB'. Additional columns should be tab-delimited and are not used by the app.

inputSpec.name: genome_lib
inputSpec.label: genome_lib
inputSpec.help: A CTAT genome library, which is a reference file bundle required by Trinity CTAT tools

inputSpec.name: include_trinity
inputSpec.label: include_trinity
inputSpec.help: Set to 'true' to run Trinity de novo reconstruction of fusion transcripts from reads, or 'false' to skip this analysis

inputSpec.name: opt_parameters
inputSpec.label: Optional additional parameters to be used by FusionInspector
inputSpec.help: The optional additional parameters and flags for FusionInspector. Should be space-delimated, and in the format --parameter-name value e.g. --alignIntronMax 100000 --alignSJstitchMismatchNmax 5 -1 5 5

outputSpec.name: fi_coding
outputSpec.label: fi_coding
outputSpec.help: FusionInspector file of predicted coding effects

outputSpec.name: fi_html
outputSpec.label: fi_html
outputSpec.help: A HTML report of FusionInspector-validated fusions

outputSpec.name: fi_inspected_fusions
outputSpec.label: fi_inspected_fusions
outputSpec.help: A txt file containing a list of fusions inspected by FusionInspector

outputSpec.name: fi_missed_fusions
outputSpec.label: fi_missed_fusions
outputSpec.help: A txt file containing a list of fusions not analysed by FusionInspector
